verses.verse: A <S%H7892>Song<s%> of <S%H4609>degrees<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. I was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Let us <S%H3212>go<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

<S%H8033>Whither<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%>, the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H3050>LORD<s%>, unto the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
For there are <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, the <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. are: Heb. do sit
<S%H7592>Pray<s%> for the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: they shall <S%H7951>prosper<s%> that <S%H157>love<s%> thee.
<S%H7965>Peace<s%> be within thy <S%H2426>walls<s%>, and <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> within thy <S%H759>palaces<s%>.
For my <S%H251>brethren<s%> and <S%H7453>companions'<s%> sakes, I will now <S%H1696>say<s%>, <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be within thee.
Because of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> thy <S%H2896>good<s%>.
